body: So i have been seeing pics and there have been some cool texture packs on the picture. I don't have 1 and i wan't to know how to install one. Please help me.
body_tagged: So i have been seeing pics and there have been some cool texture packs on the picture. I don't have 1 and i wan't to know how to install one. Please help me.
title: Texture Packs???

replies.body: go to start> type run in the box>go to .minecraft>find a folder called texture packs>if you have chrome your downloads will appear on the bottom of the window just drag the pack to the texture pack folder>done
replies.body_tagged: go to start> type run in the box>go to .minecraft>find a folder called texture packs>if you have chrome your downloads will appear on the bottom of the window just drag the pack to the texture pack folder>done

replies.body: or got to options in mc and look for resource packs and then open the resource pack folder
replies.body_tagged: or got to options in mc and look for resource packs and then open the resource pack folder

replies.body:
First.  Shift+Command g
This should bring  you to a screen that shows 


Once you see that, then hit "enter" it should show an empty resource pack folder, (in your case)
Then get your texture pack that you downloaded from the download section of the mac, and drag and drop the pack folder into the resource pack folder

Hope this helps
PS. Here is image of what it should look like

But yours would be empty :P 

EDIT: This is an alternate way to do ithttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p8y6W2yM7zc

replies.body: How do you open them up on minecraft though?
replies.body_tagged: How do you open them up on minecraft though?

replies.body: I have sphax i just don't know how to put it onto minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: I have sphax i just don't know how to put it onto minecraft.

replies.body: You go to options in Minecraft and click on Resource Packs. You can there select the Resource Pack you desire to use.
replies.body_tagged: You go to options in Minecraft and click on Resource Packs. You can there select the Resource Pack you desire to use.

replies.body: Only if you downloaded the packs first.
replies.body_tagged: Only if you downloaded the packs first.
